2021.title: Sigstore
2021.description: Sigstore, publicly launched in June 2021 by Google, Red Hat and Linux Foundation collaborators, offers open‑source code signing and transparent logging to secure software supply chains.

2021.title: Wolfi (Chainguard Linux distro)
2021.description: Wolfi, released in 2021 by Chainguard, is an open‑source Linux distribution designed for supply‑chain hardened containers and reproducible builds.

2021.title: Sysdig Falco (Cloud‑native runtime)
2021.description: Falco, Sysdig’s CNCF runtime security project, saw major growth in 2021 as a tool to detect anomalous system calls and Kubernetes API activity in production.

2021.title: privacyIDEA
2021.description: privacyIDEA is an open‑source multi‑factor authentication system highlighted in 2021 as a robust MFA solution for enterprise identity and access security.

2021.title: ProFuzzBench
2021.description: ProFuzzBench, published in early 2021, is an open‑source benchmark suite targeting stateful protocol fuzzing across common server implementations.

2021.title: CVEfixes
2021.description: CVEfixes, introduced in July 2021, automatically collects CVE‑documented vulnerabilities and associated patches from open‑source repositories, facilitating security research.
